name: Luwak Garden Coffee Shop
address: Pejukutan, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: It is the Worlds best coffee made by the wild tree cat (luwak). A very special place in the middle of nowhere. You will pass it on the way to diamond beach. The owner Jero is very friendly. Also the rest of the staff. You can try herbal coffee and tea. They were all great. Luwak coffee tastes very good. The cafe is new. There are no crowds. So if you wanna drink and experience new tastes, you should definitely come here. Enjoy the peaceful place. Jero showes you around in his garden. And there is also a little coffee shop where you can buy some souvenirs and good coffee. I will definitely come back. Thank you ;-)
review 2: If ‚Äúcoffee is life‚Äù for you. You must visit here if in Nusa Penida!!! The Luwak coffee is amazing and I don‚Äôt normally drink black coffee. The herbal teas are also the best I have have had. Host was was very nice and informative. And I can‚Äôt forget the view. Amazing!
review 3: accidentally on the road met a cheerful hoyahin farm, where he offered us a Cup of coffee luvak. additionally, we were given 8 test drinks to the Cup of coffee. perhaps many drinks are not saturated, but in general, it is a great opportunity to try different and samle important : coffee louvak.
review 4: Had an incredible stop at Luwak Garden Coffee in pejukutan! Received free samples of 9 diverse herbal teas and enjoyed the amazing benefits of luwak coffee. Huge thanks to Juro and Yenni for their fantastic hospitality. The sunset and view were unreal, making it a truly unforgettable experience!
review 5: A must visit for coffee and tea lovers. Jero and team are very welcoming and love to explain you everything about the products they produce, serve and sell. Jero's Family has a coffee plantage in Bali where the Luwak coffee comes from. Luwak garden is a whole concept where coffee tasting, garden architecture, family business, medicine and social interactions are combined. Only happy and positive vibes here. This will be the coffee place to be in Nusa Penida in no time. Good luck and thank you Jero ‚ò∫Ô∏èüôè

name: Wood Kitchen
address: Pejukutan, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
For me one of the best places to eat on the way to Diamond Beach.
The owner of the place was very nice to us, she and her family cook very well, the food was delicious. The place is very clean and has a supermarket next door. üòç
review 2: Short stop on the way to diamond beach. Nice refreshing opportunity. We also decided to eat a pizza which was good and you could see the love in the details. Hope that some of you also stops there on the way and support this nice family üôè
review 3: A++++ Great restaurant, tasty food, good price and very nice friendly family. Highly recommended.
review 5:
Very good restaurant for the riders on the road.
The menu is simple but efficient.
Just one advice: stop putting mayo on burgers, it makes the burger difficult to eat

name: The Wedding Venue of Wahyu & Aris
